attributes.action: call a General Election immediately, to allow the populace to express their wishes at the ballot box over the Equitable Life debacle.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of its intransigence in fully accepting the Parlaimentary Ombudsman's request for justice which would be equitable to all who have suffered as a result of the Equitable Life debacle, we call upon the Prime Minister to declare a General Election immediately, and allow the populace to express their opinons and choices via the ballot box.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
